title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Accounting Interpretation Skills Development through Communication Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic accounting terminology and understanding of financial statement structures
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze provided case materials using a hermeneutic approach to explain accounting contexts.
Learners can derive and discuss polysemic meanings of accounting data through communication activities with peers.
Learners enhance their ability to reconstruct accounting judgment rationales based on formative assessment feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
